title: Council Decision of 8 December 1995 appointing the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish members of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 8 December 1995 appointing the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish members of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training (95/C 343/04)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to the Act of Accession of 1994, and in particular Article 165 (1) thereof,
Having regard to Council Decision 78/1028/EEC of 18 December 1978 setting up an Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Having regard to the nominations submitted to the Council by the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish Governments,
Whereas, by its Decision of 25 March 1994 (2), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training for the period until 24 March 1997;
Whereas the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish members and alternate members should be appointed for the same period,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training for the period ending on 24 March 1997:
A. >TABLE>
B. >TABLE>
C. >TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1995.
For the Council
The President
J. BORRELL FONTELLES
(1) OJ No L 362, 23. 12. 1978, p. 10.
(2) OJ No C 100, 9. 4. 1994, p. 1.
